name: The human invaders
description:
You are a warrior in Utopia. Your mission is to defend your planet against the Human invaders, that trying to exploit all the planet resources, by sending them back to Earth, and by completing the "Shield Project", before the planet will be destroyed by the air pollution.

WASD OR ARROW KEYS TO MOVE

AIM BY THE MOUSE

LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT

(MORE DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS- INSIDE)
